title: ComfyUI.org overview of Wan2.1 support
how_to_use_in_t2i_or_i2i: Use a T2V workflow and set frames=1 (or extract first frame).
note: This is a link stub to the original (official/community) ComfyUI workflow. Open the URL to download the workflow JSON. For still images, set total frames to 1 or export the first frame.
